ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make basic beastmen apparel. Nothing fancy, in fact, they're rather gross, but they will provide some protection from the elements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Meat Preservation & Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to make meat jerky by cooking a brined meat, then putting it in a meat smoking pit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crude Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to construct crude clubs and the like. Includes knives.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crude Ranged Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to construct crude but cunningly effective bows, and throwing axes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crude Structures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to make walls and doors out of leather or fabric, as well as crude vents.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crude Furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to make crude beds out of furs, as well as meditiation spots. In addition, allows the construction of unique beastman work tables.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metallic Horns & Hooves
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to make elaborate horns out of precious metals, and prosthetic hooves out of steel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Small Herdstones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to make herdstones as art pieces.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to build basic armor and shields. Includes basic helmets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shaman Apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to shaman robes and hoods.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crude Bladed Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to construct crude swords and axes. Ungor spears as well.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Work & Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to construct work tables, bonfires, and the like.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cruel Recreation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to make a fighting pit, where you can stage fights between your pawns for the joy of the herd.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Leader Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make warmor armor and helms. Better than basic, but still not great.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crude Great Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows beastmen to construct large and powerful weapons.
